allData.occupation: Leadership | Digital Transformation | IT Strategy Development | Harmonization of global IT Landscapes | Employee Management & Development

positions.title: Chief Information Officer (CIO)
positions.description:
Head of Group IT, Shared Services and Digital Projects

Strategic and operational responsibility for IT infrastructure, IT security, IT applications, ERP, CRM, OT and workplace solutions

Led the harmonization and standardization of IT processes at the Group level, driving increased efficiency

Fostered the automation and digitalization of business processes using AI and process mining

Evaluating and implementing new technologies e.g., AI to develop innovative business models

positions.title: Global Head of Manufacturing IT (Director)
positions.description:
Led and managed an international team across the US, Europe, Africa, and China

End-to-end responsibility for production-supporting systems, including MES, LIMS, and data management, ensuring compliance with GMP requirements

Maintained the validated status of all IT systems in strict accordance with regulatory requirements

Strategic SAP consulting for site managers, driving the optimization of operational processes

Evaluated and implemented new technologies, while automating and digitalizing production processes to drive efficiency improvements

positions.title: Head of Process IT & Technical Support
positions.description:
Managed the department with full budget responsibility

End-to-end responsibility for production-supporting IT and OT systems, IT infrastructure, and business-critical applications at the Penzberg site

Automated and digitalized site processes through the application of advanced analytics

Headed the maintenance and master data management workstream in the global SAP S/4HANA migration project

positions.title: Head of Business Intelligence
positions.description:
Managed an international team of 100 employees across Germany, Romania, the US, India, and Pakistan, with a budget responsibility of €30 million

End-to-end responsibility for business intelligence systems, providing strategic consulting to develop new business models through advanced and predictive analytics

positions.title: Head of Application Operations
positions.description:
Managed an international operations team of approximately 150 employees with a budget responsibility of €40 million, overseeing software deployment in 28 countries and continuous optimization of IT systems

Led operational IT services for ERP, CRM, e-commerce, web, logistics, and business intelligence systems, while strategically developing and expanding the IT infrastructure

allData.headline: Leadership | Digital Transformation | IT Strategy Development | Harmonization of global IT Landscapes | Employee Management & Development
allData.summary:
𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲𝗱 𝗖-𝗹𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗹 𝗲𝘅𝗲𝗰𝘂𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲 with a strong track record of leading international teams and driving the development and execution of global IT strategies, including successful SAP S/4HANA implementations

𝗜𝗻𝘀𝗽𝗶𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘀𝘁𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗴𝗶𝗰 𝗹𝗲𝗮𝗱𝗲𝗿 with extensive expertise in transforming IT and OT organizations into agile, customer-centric units

𝗦𝘂𝗰𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗳𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘆 𝗱𝗶𝗴𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘇𝗲𝗱 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗮𝘂𝘁𝗼𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗯𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗲𝘀 using innovative technologies e.g., AI, IoT, and process mining, driving sustainable improvements in efficiency and competitiveness

𝗘𝘅𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗲𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗶𝗻 𝗵𝗮𝗿𝗺𝗼𝗻𝗶𝘇𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗴𝗹𝗼𝗯𝗮𝗹 𝗜𝗧 𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗱𝘀𝗰𝗮𝗽𝗲𝘀, implementing forward-looking technologies, and strategically advancing international IT infrastructures

𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝘁𝗶𝘀𝗲: Stakeholder management | multi-project management | employee management & development | agile working methods (SCRUM & KANBAN) | service transition management (outsourcing & insourcing) harmonization & standardization | ERP & CRM | process automation | digitalization | eCommerce | Cloud | AI

𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗽𝗼𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗯𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆: Budget € 55 million | managed up to 170 employees in 16 countries

resilient | flexible | conflict resolution skills | assertive | eloquent | communication skills | reliable
